comment.author: 84765021@N00
comment._content: At the top of the picture, it says 1912. There was a Republican State Convention in Saratoga Springs on September 25 (which may have run over into the 26th as well).

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: And at the beginning of September, 1912, the New York State Democratic Conventon met in this same Saratoga Springs convention hall. So which convention is this?
